Author: ozmin
Title: It blends
Body: For 30 bucks you are awarded the opportunity to develop a skillset to be envied by your less patient and ill-equipped friends as you advance through the levels of fruit smoothie making challenges set forth you each day...was that enough almond milk?...too much frozen berry? ...should I add the banana first, last, in the middle?! ...All in the hopes of creating that one smoothie you never had to stop the blades for from start to finish...But you’re up for it...you knew what you were getting into...you welcomed the challenge the first time you guffawed at those higher priced machines designed to lay waste anything less than a 9 on the Mohs scale. This machine WILL strip you to your core. Oh what will be revealed as you, day in and day out, feather in just the right amount of spinach while gauging the subtle changes in greenish hues whirling about, in hopes of avoiding that dry, sucking sound of the blades spinning against nothing but an air pocket at the bottom of your chilled gruel? In the less weathered, softer hands of some who might be afforded a life of protection from this harsh world, use of this machine may result in emotional pain, tears, and quite possibly a weakening of the soul...that is not you however...you will gain not only the digestive fortitude you seek and life lengthening superpower of the macronutrient overload you cram in with every tablespoon of every exotic seed known to man, but you will also gain a seemingly inhuman sort of imperviousness to all the everyday trials that once seemed to paralyze you with unbelief at how this could happen to someone like you. You will rise above and you will walk just a little higher than those around you...but only as a beacon of patience and hope to the untested. Or you can spend hundreds for the ease of a truly smooth operation every morning and continue going about each day sniveling and decrying the absurdity of your petty inconveniences....choice is always yours.

Author: Rick
Title: Cheap and does the job but has quality issues.
Body: The Hamilton Beach Power Elite Blender is an affordable but very basic blender.Materials and build quality - I give it an average rating because, while it does the job of blending, the build quality and materials is not good and is only adequate to doing the job. The glass jar has a yellowish tint to it like the glass has impurities in it. The plastics are hard and thin. The lid is very difficult to remove and I always have to make sure I have a good hold on the jar before trying to remove the lid. The buttons have a hard clicky feel. The rubber feet are perhaps the most annoying aspect of the build quality. The rubber feet on my unit leaves black marks on my quartz countertop that are difficult to wipe off without some kind of cleaning chemical (dish soap won't remove the marks). When the motor runs, the base unit (underneath) gives off a foul dried fish smell, and no I have never put fish in the blender. I can only guess the smell is coming from the plastics or motor heating up. If you have any concerns about carcinogens in plastics, I would recommend to avoid this blender. The rubber feet marks and the difficult to remove lid are the main reasons, this blender isn't getting 5 stars.The good - I purchased this blender to make smoothies, and for that it works well. No complaints there.Yes, it does need adequate liquids to blend and move the solids.Overall this is an ok blender when on sale, but I would recommend to spend a bit more to get a better quality blender. If price is absolute then this blender would suffice for basic functions. This unit is definitely one of those you get what you pay for.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Unable to blend frozen bananas.

Author: gwr

Author: Ethan Knudsen
Title: You like smoothies? Well too bad.
Body: The blender arrived at our porch and my wife and I attempted to make a smoothie the day it got here. We put in frozen bananas, greek yogurt, blackberries, spinach, and lime (which are regulars in our smoothies), attempted to blend it, and NOTHING happened. That's right, NOTHING. The blender didn't pull down the fruit as advertised, heck, it didn't even have the power to pull down the greek yogurt that was at the bottom of the blender. It seriously lacks the power to make a smoothie and I'd recommend finding a higher power blender, even if it is a higher cost.

Author: Brenda H. Nelson
Title: Good, but broke after 3 months.
Body: It has 6 buttons-- off, lo power, hi power, & 3 intermittent manual buttons. I never used the latter 3. I usually used the first 3. The second one ( lo power ) stopped working after a few months. I used the machine a few times a week. The sound is very loud and rough running. The mixing action is excellent as it pulls the liquid down at the start...not splattering everything upward as most machines do. Good engineering design. The jar is clear , heavy glass and is wider and less tall than most machines--good. Too bad it stopped working on lo speed so soon. I'd have given it a a 4 or 5 star rating otherwise. The lid is designed differently from other lids and the odd design caused spillage during pouring until I got used to it.

Author: LauraBabora
Title: Eh...
Body: I mean, you get what you pay for, right?I don't like that the glass container & the bottom console don't click or snap in together. The glass container just... sits there. So if you pick up the console & glass container together, if you move the wrong way, the glass container will fall over & break.Also, I've found that the blades don't work half the time, as if the gear part underneath doesn't connect properly with the gear part on the console, so there is no action happening, so I have to move the container or wiggle it around. I've made sure nothing is broken or interfering with the gears but it still just doesn't work sometimes.The lid goes over the lip of the glass container on the top & you have to really force it on & off... which to me, is a hassle & kind of annoying. I've had some better blenders where the lid sits inside of the lip of the glass container & it's secure & doesn't let anything leak, so this one isn't my favorite.In regards to blending power, it's easy if you use liquids or easily squished things, like small chunks of tomatoes or onions. But as soon as I use ice or frozen fruit or anything else with a little bit of substance, like peanut butter, it doesn't work. The blades just get stuck. I try to pulse it so it breaks free, but that doesn't do anything either.So this is good if you need something for simple things like maybe making salsa, but if you want frozen margaritas or smoothies using frozen fruit or even peanut butter, good luck getting anywhere.

Author: CLEAN Lady Lê 😘
Title: Perfect for my needs!
Body: Isn’t as powerful as a Vitamix or Blentec, probably won’t last nearly as long either, but who cares, I don’t need neither! I got these to make my morning elixirs, so it’s perfect for the job. I won’t be using it for ice or for frozen fruits, so the wear and tear won’t be too bad and longevity will hopefully compensate. This thing is perfect for things I’ll actually use it for like morning elixirs and health drinks, making hemp milk, dipping sauces and blending foods. It’s completely easy to clean. Much less clunky to use than the clunky Vitamix. It’s compact in design. The 40 oz pitcher is perfect for a two-person family of just me and my husband.TIP:Super easy to clean. Simply spray down with hot water immediately after use and let air dry. Avoid soaking the blade. For stubborn stickiness, blend a cup of water to loosen debris.

It’s not a Vitamix, so it won’t always purée things velvety smooth, but for regular smoothies and everyday mixing, pulsing, and chopping, it’s more than serviceable. One thing: don’t put your blender components in the dishwasher - it dries out the tops and rubber gaskets over time. Just do a quick disassembly to easily wash and dry after use. You’ll greatly extend the life (and appearance) of any blender.

Author: Sam
Title: OK for the price
Body: I have smoothie making down to an art and while this blender gets the job done it's a little frustrating to use. I like Hamilton Beach in general and their reliability. However, it appears they wanted to reinvent the science of mixing and instead of a good old vortex they have tried 'wave action'. This has some problems. 1. Sometimes the ingredients are slammed up against the bottom of the lid. The blade design throws things upward.Unfortunately the lid is too tight to fit onto the glass body so I have to use one hand to keep it from coming off. It's also a good idea to make sure the top two hatches are tightly closed. I dare not open the top hatch to add ingredients because cleaning the walls later is not fun. 2. The ingredients can get air locked about the time the consistency of the smoothie is perfect. Because there is no vortex it can trap a large air bubble against the blade which stops all mixing and the blade spins out of control until you stir. That's not a big deal but the vortex would have prevented this. 3. The large diameter at the top of the glass makes it difficult to pour into a regular size glass. It can be done by scraping the smoothie out with a spatula instead of pouring. This is why Osterizer used a four cornered vessel I guess - one of the corners created a pour spout. 4. Not fun to clean the lid. Too many hard to reach areas. Will probably need to find a dedicated brush that will fit it.I would have bought another Osterizer but their reliability ratings seemed much lower. They had the tapered vessel, the vortex and the easy to clean lid perfected in the old unit I had.

On the third morning, smoke was billowing out of the base and I was afraid a fire would ignite. I realize its not a pricey unit, but it was advertised to crush ice and frozen fruit. Didn't expect it to die after 5 months. I will not replace this unit and have reached out to Hamilton Beach support but have not heard back yet.

Yesterday I tried to puree about 2/3 cups heavy cream with 5 ice cubes. No luck--the ice cubes stayed in large chunks. This will go in a garage sale and I will go with a pricier--but working--blender.

Title: Terrible Blender
Body: Based on the price of this blender, I didn't have very high expectations, but apparently they were too high. This blender can't even blend a banana - not a frozen banana, a ripe banana. I would not recommend this blender unless you only need to blend water - not frozen water (as in an ice cube), just regular water - and would like to do so as loudly as possible.

Author: Caribouwoman
Title: Unique Turbo action does good job of mixing, chopping, blending!
Body: This turbo action blender does a great job on frozen fruit, smoothies etc. due to the type of blades, it does a great job of mixing! Glad I got it,!

Author: Kinsey
Title: HOUSE FIRE HAZARD. WORST PRODUCT EVER.
Body: I have used this blender only 3 times. The first time I used it I made a banana milkshake, it sounded like it was going to blow up upon first use so I took the top off, mixed everything up, and tried again. After mixing it up by hand a few times, it finally began to blend smoothly. I had to do this for all 3 times I used it. The final time, just now, I again tried to make a banana milkshake although my hand mixing didn’t seem to be working like before. It started to make a horrid intense sound so I cut it off and tired again. This time the whole bottom started smelling like burnt rubber and smoking!!!! I was so fortunate to notice the smoke & unplug it in time. Save your money this is the worst product I’ve ever purchased.

Author: James Wiggins
Title: Awesome
Body: Awesome

Author: Madison Flippence
Title: Does not last long at all
Body: This worked a total of 3 times before going up in smoke blending fruit. Very disappointed especially after seeing so many good reviews. Not durable at all. If you want one that lasts, this is not the blender for you.

Author: Alex
Title: Severely under powered.
Body: This blender is severely underpowered. Food will get trapped under the blades and remain whole. I tried to make a smoothie and only half of the fruit was blended the rest stayed in chunks or small pieces leaving the smoothie lumpy. Don’t waste the money.

Author: leigha ransom
Title: Hamilton Beach
Body: Great for smoothies. Crushes ice Nicely. The top

Author: Amazon Customer

Author: Amazon Customer

Total waste of time on everyones part on not figuring out that the glass was broken just by the sound of the box!Now I had to take time out of my day to return. That won't happen again.

Body: I bought this blender after my last, 12+yr old, Hamilton Beach blender finally broke. I do miss my old blender but this one crushes ice very well, even larger blocks. No chunks of ice or frozen fruit in my drink.

Author: Quality for Less
Title: Disappointing
Body: Today was my first day unboxing and using the blender.I blended the smoothie for about 45 seconds on the milkshake option. I stopped the blender and opened the lid to check an see if the thickness of the smoothie was to my liking. It was a little thin,so I added just a little more avocado and decided to use the smoothie option. I let it blend for about another 45 seconds,and stopped it to do another check for thickness.It was perfect,so I began to lift the jar to pour the smoothie in my cup. To my surprise, the entire blade portion disconnected from the base and the smoothie spilled all inside the base and all over my counter top! So disappointing! I am starting the return of this item immediately.

Body: This blender is a nice mid-price level blender. The pitcher is a thick, glass pitcher and the base is sturdy. The pitcher contains more volume than it appears because it is a wide pitcher. My only gripe comes from the lid. The top of the lid allows liquid from cracks on the top while mixing. It is difficult to place the lid on the pitcher as well, but I suspect that will improve over multiple uses. A better lid would have resulted in a better score.

The blades are just too small and unable to make anything that isn't already a liquid. Worth spending a little more to get an actual blender instead of this $30 stirrer.

Title: BF gift
Body: The Hamilton brand blender was a gift to my boyfriend. He is dedicated to a healthier lifestyle and he wanted a blender to make smoothie with. He loves the blender and the different modes it can be under.

Author: Cristopher
Title: Will not loose your money
Body: Really good and can use for all your needs.

Author: James Owens
Title: A blender that can blend frozen fruit and protein shakes!
Body: So I recently started drinking protein shakes and decided it was time to get a blender so I can mix in fresh and frozen fruit. I got a $20 blender from (Unnamed store) and it was OK...if you didn’t mind half-mixed powder, a strong odor of burning plastic every time you use it and frozen fruits just “Danced” on the blades.So I threw that in the trash, where it and said retailer belong for selling such garbage and got this blender. It shouldn’t be amazing to anyone that a blender can handle a task as simple as blending a protein shake and fruit but it does it and it does it so well. Frozen fruits, fresh fruits, this blender doesn’t care. It will blend it like it’s the protein power. No chunks of fruit, no giant globs of protein powder stuck in the corners...just a beautifully blended protein shake.So, if you’ve tried the rest drop the cash on this beast and you’ll get the best.

Author: Moriah
Title: Not great
Body: Doesn’t blend well at all! Chunky and lumpy smoothie after many minutes of blending.

Author: jon
Title: Blade not turning.
Body: I used this for a total of 5 smoothie blends and the blade stops turning. I literally have to shake the whole blender for it to unstick and work for 3 seconds. Very disappointed. Another bad amazon purchase. Becoming a normal on here. Sigh. UPDATE** Amazon refused to replace item, and no one from Hamilton has contacted me like amazon said they would. 1 star till this is handled.

Author: Natalie
Title: Disappointed.
Body: After 2 use, the smoothie button is not working.

Author: MER
Title: Weak blender
Body: The blending stopped working and started leaking after 3 uses. I tried multiple settings and tightened the seal, but it couldn’t blend frozen fruit without having to stop, open the lid, stir, and blend every 15 seconds. Don’t waste your money unless you have something that doesn’t really need to be blended.

I like the different blending settings too, but it's also not over the top with the number of options either. it's great! the blender container is high quality this glass and the overall device and appartus is very easy to clean. I am very satisfied with this purchase!

Author: Zapango
Title: Poorly designed and frustrating to use! Don’t buy!
Body: I’ve been trying to use this machine for months with mostly frustration to show for it. It does a terrible job of pretty much everything and I inevitably wind up getting out other tools and utensils to finish the job. The bowl and lid are so badly designed that the machine is mostly useless. The bowl is too wide and the food does not feed down properly, even when very liquid. The lid has so many bumps and pockets that it is very hard to clean. The cutting blade is in a recess that forms a small trench where food collects and jams. Just a waste of money and now I’m throwing it away. Shame on Hamilton Beach for making such a bad product!

The lid is ridiculously hard to take off and the blades are kind of hard to clean under. I’d actually return it if I could.

Body: The lid doesn't fit tightly so I have to stand there & hold it. It takes a long time to liquefy frozen fruit. Nice glass though.

Author: J. Campbell
Title: Couldn’t even make a couple milkshakes
Body: Burned out during first use. Followed all instructions perfectly. No customer service help whatsoever. Do not buy this blender!

Author: n0nch
Title: Please pass on this, it’s not worth it.
Body: I wanted a blender so I could make a few smoothies, and potentially sauces. I read the reviews and saw that they were primarily negative, but a few good ones thrown in too. I decided to take a chance since I didn’t mind if it crapped out after a year, I just wanted something that could easily blend and work for a bit.I was so wrong in taking the chance and now have to deal with the annoyance of returning it. I tried out a simple 3 ingredient banana smoothie; oats, banana, and milk.The first step is to blend the oats, and it took me about 2-3 minutes of pulsing, blending, and taking the jar off to shake it around to get them somewhat blended. I added in the other ingredients and it’s literally chunky. I attached a picture where you can see the “blended oats”.I know whoever is considering this blender is looking for a cheaper alternative to the expensive ones, but don’t waste your time or money. Spend just a little more to get something of quality.The only upside of this blender is the “easyclean” function where you just need some water and a little bit of soap, and it’s clean.

Author: Rebecca H.Gallogly
Title: Great blender
Body: I don't know what sheerness is, but I bought this after I broke my last food processor making hair gel with xanthan gum in it. By comparison, this is a sturdy beast. It has all the features a person could ask for, and it is intuitive to use and easy to clean.

Author: Will
Title: Garbage
Body: I received my blender package was amazing..Cleaned it before use,added some ice,fruits,and flavoring, maybe half way up. Turned on... stopped it stirred the mixture turned back on ,and maybe 10 seconds smoke was pouring out of it unplugged it pit out the fire threw it away. Worst purchase ever

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not good for smoothies
Body: I purchased this to make smoothies based on the reviews however, it did not blend well at all. The power of the blades is not strong enough to blend frozen fruit, the lid was impossible to get off and the blender itself was difficult to clean. I am surprised at the high ratings for this blender but maybe it was for non-frozen foods. A blender should really be able to blend through frozen fruit in my opinion. I returned it.

Author: Alli Alli
Title: Happy blending for me.
Body: Blending powerI am so greatful for my new blender

Author: Poketitans
Title: It’s good
Body: This is a great blender for its price but one thing that I don’t like about it is that the lid doesn’t stay shut when blending. It starts to come off a little but not fully.

Author: MrCrum
Title: The collar broke...
Body: Great for a cheap blender! Worked PERFECTLY... until the plastic collar that holds the blade in the bottom broke.Tried looking up replacement collars online but can't find the right one.

Author: superdave072
Title: nice product, lousy customer service
Body: The product brags about 12 functions, however, there are no instructions in the user manual on how to implement them. customer service personnel are MIA. e-mail only. a reply is about 3 business days and asks for a lot on info that is not available, or non-existent I use it to make milkshakes only since lacking info unavailable. THEY USE COVID FOR AN EXCUSE NOT TO HELP YOU. I REPLIED YOU CAN NOT CATCH COVID OVER THE PHONE. THEY WERE QUICK TO SEND ME AN E-MAIL ASKING ME TO GIVE THEM A GOOD REVIEW, WELL HERE IS THE TRUTH. after extensive searching found a test article that shows the missing info on how the 4 buttons work, not included in the manual, tried each, hope i saved you some time.

Author: Nick
Title: Poor quality and terrible customer service.
Body: Glass part came broken prior to opening. Box was completely in tact with no damage to it. When I contacted Hamilton Beach for a replacement they told me it was not covered under warranty..even though it came like this from the warehouse. They then gave me a coupon code for free shipping and directed me to their website to spend MORE money to buy a replacement glass piece, which will probably be just as broken as this one. Save your money and don't buy from Hamilton Beach. Terrible customer service.

Author: Robin
Title: Works Well
Body: Works great, large container holds a lot.

Author: MARY DARLENE PERRY
Title: IT DIED ON ME...
Body: LOVED THIS ITEM...BUT... IT DIED AFTER THE SECOND USAGE... STARTED SMOKING AND POWER WENT OUT ON THAT SECTION OF MY KITCHEN...

Author: Llocsird'o Ttam
Title: Don’t recommend
Body: Not a fan of this blender. I bought this for making milkshakes however it can not chop ice or breakdown ice cream very well. I recommend a higher priced model.

Author: Don F.
Title: Sheer junk
Body: I owned 2 or 3 three of these, which worked well except the top was too big for the jar in my previous one, so I just used the top of the one before it. On the present one the same was true, so I used the old top again. But on this one the major blending button, the lowest speed, stopped functioning after about 2 weeks, so I had to use the next one up for a smoothie, and it whipped the contents into the consistency of soft-serve ice cream, better eaten with a spoon than drunk. So it's virtually worthless for my purposes. I've finally learned my lesson. You get what you pay for.

Author: Rosa N
Title: Does not work
Body: Purchased this blender due to the great reviews, but was extremely disappointed. It does not even blend tomatoes...you ees to chop and wven then they're chunky. Do not recommend.

Author: S West
Title: Not a good product
Body: Did not even work on the first use. Had to go out an purchase a different blender the next day.

Author: Angel
Title: Great pricing 4 what it does
Body: Really good smoothie maker so far with multiple settings easy to clean? I had it for a few wks now my last 1 different Brand smoothie maker broke battery burnt out in a mth. I give another review in 6 mths to update. It's worth a try I think 4 the money and so far so good I use it at least 4times a wk or more.

Author: Annette Young
Title: I mean, you get what you pay for?
Body: Other reviewers mentioned this, but this really isn’t an ideal blender if you’re making anything remotely thick. You need to add a lot of liquid to get it to do what you want—my mango protein smoothies had to get a lot more liquidy than what I’m used to. It’s also incessantly loud and takes forever pressing between the buttons to try and get it to chop through frozen pieces. But it is a budget blender, so that’s more or less to be expected.

Author: justin byeom hyuk Lee
Title: Noise is little loud.
Body: Almost satisfied but Noise is little loud.

Author: mg713
Title: Very difficult to put the lid on and take it off
Body: The lid fits much too tightly. So tightly that it was very difficult for me to remove it after putting it on. We sent this back because we couldn't use it easily.

Author: Branden Bays
Title: Freaking amazing just buy it!
Body: a+ blender! blends frozen fruit like a charm!

Author: Ronaldo
Title: Great Product
Body: Great affordable blender.... for making smoothies

Author: Carol Ann Glasheen
Title: Poorly designed product
Body: It is almost impossible to put on and remove the lid with ease. Once the lid is on, it blends fine. I will not give it away, I will throw it away to prevent anyone else from having to deal with this problem. It is a very poor design. I have arthritic hands and found it extremely difficult to use this product. I should have returned it a long time ago. Please remove this item from your inventory.

Author: Lula Custis
Title: No power
Body: It didn't blend well at all. Left pieces of unblended fruit in my smoothie and it leaks. I tried it with frozen fruit and thawed fruit and it did the same thing. Gave it 3 stars because it's easy to clean and came with a spout.

Author: Sleepyshoe
Title: Have never had a problem with any items purchased from Amazon Warehouse
Body: The blender arrived on time stated and well packaged. Works exactly as described, a very good deal. Will purchase from the warehouse again, excellent prices. Thank you Amazon.....

Author: ubisoon
Title: Wow
Body: Didn't expect it so much with this price but wow. Easy to clean, works wonderfully, looks sturdy.

Author: Marie
Title: great product
Body: highly recommended

Author: E. PENA
Title: Barely blends cake batter, let alone anything frozen
Body: I bought this for making smoothies and liked that it had a pouring spot. It doesn't do a very good job, however. I have to take the pitcher off the base several times, shake it, and put it back several times before my smoothie is drinkable. It's just not powerful enough to simply pull the frozen items toward the blades. It barely worked to mix cake batter, that's how much this blender sucks.

Author: Lynn Burson
Title: Works well
Body: This works for the simple blending I want to do.

Author: Veronica smith
Title: Will not blend properly!
Body: The blender will not blend properly. The blade is not sharp enough to chop or mix up anything .... I was very excited about it and now that I have it I’m very disappointed about the product .

Author: Lena
Title: Weak
Body: Weak blending power. Difficult to clean. Did not fully blend strawberry banana smoothie.

Author: Big Rob
Title: weak product
Body: The first time I try using this product it started smoking, it seems like something started to burn on the very first use. this is also the first time I have ever waited for a refund that is taking longer to get my money back. Normally I get my refund immediately after verifying the return of the product.

Author: J W
Title: Wonderful Blender!
Body: Just what I needed! At a great price!

Author: Lola
Title: Great product
Body: Beautiful, affordable

Author: Big T
Title: Power
Body: So far I'm satisfied with the power of the blender. My first protein shake.. Cleaning was easy and simple.

Author: Maria Briones
Title: Excelente
Body: Muy buen producto.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Find a different blender
Body: I’m currently in the middle of cleaning the biggest mess that’s ever been made in my entire life. As I finished blending a smoothie I took the blender off of the base and after I began pouring the bottom came off. Talk about an absolute disaster of a joke. Please whatever you do, don’t buy this. Buy any other alternative to this blender, I would like to add that none of my smoothies (regardless of water amount like other people have suggested) was made with ease, I can not wait to smash this thing to pieces.

Author: Yvette
Title: Do Not Buy!!!!!!
Body: Absolute Thrash, Do not buy it 😒

Author: Juan
Title: A+
Body: A+

Author: cynmarie
Title: Collar Broken No Replacement!!!!!
Body: The collar that holds the blade and is used to screw the pitcher on the base cracked within a few months. Hamilton Beach's website doesn't sell the replacement. I am so disappointed that I paid $30 for a product I am no longer able to use. Very disappointed.

Author: Norma
Title: Blender
Body: For the price that it is I believe it works decent

Author: gilbert mendez
Title: great
Body: liked

Author: T. Lindhe
Title: Great little blender
Body: I’d like this little blender so much I purchased it as a shower gift as a housewarming gift and also as a Christmas gift this little thing is better than my Expensive name brand blender

Author: Jpilrose
Title: Stopped working within 5 months
Body: Don't buy this blender. It stopped working after 5 months of use.

Author: Imelda Mendez
Title: The lid is iffy
Body: It works great, however the lid is pretty hard to put on and remove.

Author: Bryan Smith
Title: NO POWER
Body: I really do not recommend this product. the capacity physically smaller than picture on website.The biggest issue is no power. I already chopped fruits to small pieces as I did to my previous blender.it is not working. I have to take all pieces out of blender and dice it again. disappointed.

Author: LORETTA M.
Title: Do not add warm, lukewarm, nor hot liquids to your glass jar blender because it will crack.
Body: I read the directions carefully about blending hot and lukewarm liquids. It’s not true. I didn’t have the top on. It cracked from the bottom to the top, as seen in the photos. That made me cry because I really loved my blender.

Author: Jenene Phillips
Title: Doesn’t work
Body: Ive only had this blender for about 10months and it has blown out. It’s smoking and it stopped working.

Author: Karen Christiansen
Title: Not that powerful
Body: Wish it had more power, but still good for price.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: pulse button does not work
Body: For the price I decided to keep it.every thing is made in China..Most thing are not made in USA anymore.Cheap but does the job.

Author: AmazonQueenNC
Title: Blends ice!
Body: I was skeptical that this blender would be able to smoothly blender ice BUT IT DOES!! I’ve put in ice cubes, chunks of frozen spinach, and frozen fruit all at the same time and as long as you put in enough liquid (water, juice, milk) it will blend it up perfectly. We’ll see if it stands the test of time, but for the price, can’t beat it!

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Basic blender
Body: Basic cheap blender but it gets the job done. Not great for chopping vegetables, but it works.

Author: Vanessa Duran
Title: Bad Blender
Body: Not a good blender, only 2 speeds lack of blending power. Blades are to small Everything gets stuck with blades. Not Satisfied with purchase.

Author: Kenneth Rothfuss
Title: Frozen beware
Body: 1st time using and wouldn’t blend frozen vegetables with water. Only reason why I bought it. Returned and buying a Ninja.

Author: koldfusion748
Title: Worked fine, but didn't last long.
Body: Bought this blender and it worked fine for about 2.5 years before kicking the bucket. I used this blender pretty infrequently, so I was sad to see it didn't last longer. Might be a good choice on a budget, but don't expect any longevity out of it.

Author: Stevie
Title: Great
Body: Works great for food recipes (like sauces) and smoothies (even with added ice and frozen fruit). Easy to clean!

Author: Tabitha Barnes
Title: Need another blender
Body: I love the look of this blender but it doesn't hardly blend anything. Reason being - the blades are too short and small. I have tried blending sauces, half melted butter or a recipe, a small smoothie - i would rather have another Nutra-Bullet over this blender.

Author: Abbie
Title: Poor performance
Body: This blender is terrible! It took 20 minutes and a lot of pressing to get onions, cilantro and garlic blended. The price is definitely evidence of the quality of this blender. Don't buy it. Spend the extra dollars to get one of better quality and performance.

Author: Becky M.
Title: Very nice
Body: I love it for daiquiris and margaritas

Author: Sonni
Title: doesnt really work
Body: i was SO excited to finally buy a new blender. we got this and i used it maybe 3 times before it started screwing up. it constantly sounds like it has something stuck in it and only blends the innermost contents. doesn't matter how much to break up, mix, shake, or add extra liquid. it just does NOT wanna work. save your money and wait to buy a better one, this thing is not worth it AT ALL

Author: Paula Williams
Title: Exactly What I Wanted
Body: So far so good. I have not had any problems with my blender. I have used it for various types of smoothies and it works great!! You have to use the right amount of liquid and it will blend perfectly.

Author: Gail R Ryan
Title: To small for my needs
Body: You can’t adjust speedEverything preprogrammedThe glass container is a bit too small for me

Author: Yoyo
Title: Worked OK but quit
Body: For the price point it was okay, but like others, has started leaking from the bottom! Not happy. Not in the mood to deal with these issues!

Author: Satish Kumar
Title: Never buy
Body: Very dispointed.

Author: bishal
Title: Does not grate or blend smooth
Body: Does not grate or blend smooth. My small ninja chopper does a better job when comparing to this.

Author: Mrs. Jones
Title: Not good if you make smoothies
Body: Bought to make smoothies... does a horrible job at getting the ice to a smoothie consistency

Author: Theresa
Title: Glass was Completely broken
Body: It came completely broken. The glass was all broken. I was really surprised that there was no styrofoam protecting the glass. It came in the same box it would be in if you were buying it in person at a store.

Author: Roxann Lucona
Title: Very Nice
Body: I love this blender

Author: ZAMAR
Title: Worst blinder
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   I put cut up apples and bananas and it didn’t blend.

Author: Jessica Dunn
Title: Great for the price!
Body: A nice replacement for my defunct Ninja blender. I don’t blend enough to spend a lot of money, so this meets my needs. My only complaint is that the lid is really difficult to pry off. I like how heavy and thick the glass pitcher is and also the ease of pouring with minimal drips.

Author: Girl_with_the_sims_tattoo
Title: worth it
Body: smoothies are my life now... i use it almost everyday super easy to clean

Author: Norma
Title: Xo
Body: Great for my smoothie 😋

Body: Works really well with liquid but ice or frozen fruit not so much. Not great for ice drinks but makes a decent broccoli pesto

Author: virginia zindell
Title: Gl
Body: The best blender that I have ever bought

Author: vittoriavh

Body: This blender does not chop vegetables, fruits, herbs--pretty much only good ifs lots of liquid also goes in.

Author: Amanda Diane Standish
Title: Blends great!
Body: Liked the fact that I could make my favorite smoothies again. Yum!

Author: Rosa
Title: Affordable
Body: Make smoothies everyday

Author: D. Janicek
Title: I love this blender!
Body: The pour spout on the lid is great too.

Author: Picy T.

Body: WAS EASY TO USE. GETTING ANOTHER ONE

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Very Good Blender
Body: Wife loves it.

Author: Jshcarla Adkins
Title: Good Blender Purchase
Body: This was good buy for the price. I do have to shake it a little because the shake powder gets clogged near the blades even with adequate water added. The blades probably should be a little longer. Still a great buy!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Quick & easy to use and clean.
Body: mixing my protein drink every morning of almond milk & banana only takes a few seconds. Awesome !!

Author: Remi
Title: Great
Body: I loved it it blends ice really well.. which my other blender did not and it broke so I am really loving this one

Author: cville5
Title: Great blender
Body: I was a bit hesitate to buy a used blender but it was exactly what I was looking for. The glass blender make it durable and I can take it apart for easy cleaning. Dishwasher safe. I've used it to blend dry items and I use it all the time to make sauces for dishes. It blends chiles really well. I don't cut the items really small which is why I think it has trouble getting started with the blending so a bit of water helps. Overall great blender.

Author: Cindy Kennedy
Title: DID NOT WORK AT ALL!!!! DULL BLADE
Body: So disappointed did not crush ice or even fruit never got to use it because it didn’t work and the blade was extremely dull could slide my finger right over it.

Author: Patricia Moore
Title: Awesome
Body: Not heavy, very efficient & easy to clean.

Author: Unknown
Title: Bad product
Body: Product didn't work. Open package a month later to use only to realize blender doesn't work and miss return window.

Author: Pyroseed13
Title: Does not chop ice well
Body: Would not recommend. The blades are too small and do chop ice well at all, as other reviewers have noted. The bottom piece came apart and spilled my drink everywhere after a few months of use. Just spend more money and get something better.

Author: Velma Smith
Title: It’s an amazing blender
Body: It’s an amazing blender

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Horrible. Do not buy
Body: Horrible blender. Takes ages to grind something as soft as tomatoes. Needs constant shaking for everything to grind.

Author: Nadya Wall-Rossi
Title: Good Blender!
Body: This is a reasonably priced, sturdy workhorse of a blender. So far, no complaints! Recommend!

Author: TN MT Mama
Title: A bit disappointed
Body: If you are making drinks, even blending with ice, this works great as a beverage machine for mixed drinks or smoothies. The minute I have anything solid in there, it will not blend unless the items are drowning in liquid.

Author: GEORGE LAVECCHIA
Title: Poor quality. Old Hamilton Beach Mixer better quality.
Body: Not enough power. Does not mix vegetables or smoothies properly. Would like to return.

Author: Andy
Title: Works fine.
Body: Works fine.

Author: Salimata S.
Title: Small, powerful and easy to clean!
Body: This blender is small but powerful. It fits perfectly in my very small kitchen. I was amazed by the easiness of the cleaning. You can take all the parts appart for the best cleaning and without cutting your fingers. I just love it.

Author: S. TAYLOR
Title: Great.
Body: Great blender for the price.

Author: Good Guy Book
Title: Good quality
Body: Very happy with this blender. It does the job right and very inexpensive.

Author: Lorraine

Body: I needed a blender specifically for making Hollandaise sauce. Needed to be able to pour ing. into top. Many blenders do not have that function. Also needed a blender that could be operated at a lower speed in order not to over blend ingredients making them too thin. I was able to accomplish that w/this blender. Also thought blender was if good quality for the price. Also think it was powerful enough to blend smoothies. Will make a good all purpose blender.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not
Body: Super noisy, very heavy and thus hard to clean. Don’t crush ice or frozen fruits...

Author: Rebecca Lee Morgan
Title: a great find at a great price
Body: a very good blender with no little rubber ring to worry about.

Author: YAYA

Body: I bought this inexpensive blender for mixing chalk paint. Works great. Cleans easily as it comes apart

Author: Jeanmcyr
Title: Plastic, plastic, plastic.
Body: Plastic jar is flimsy and hard to clean.

Author: lynn campi
Title: Sent it back
Body: Lightweight junk. Doesn’t compare to my old one. Made in China. Don’t know who made my first one but it was much better material. Very disappointed in Hamilton beach.

Author: C M
Title: Died after 3 months...
Body: Its a pretty basic blender. Not meant for everyday use. You can smell the rubber burning and the inside of the machine every time you use it. The motor isn't strong enough for it to blend properly. Had to buy another one after just 3 months. Upgraded to a black and decker. Lets see how it works.

Author: ItGirlRa
Title: MUST BUY ITEM I LOVE IT
Body: WORTH IT!!!!!!!!!!

Author: kathij
Title: Good
Body: Good

Body: It’s working good since 6 month

Author: yue
Title: It work!
Body: I like Avocado Shake!

Author: Rhea Anderson
Title: Love it
Body: Just what I wanted

Author: WenJen
Title: Don't Order This Machine
Body: This coffee maker made great coffee for a while. The last day to return was oct 11. It died Oct 28. The grinder still works, but the water does not heat and brew.

Author: Anonymous
Title: Beats all the others I have tried hands down
Body: Easy to clean and works great

Author: Robert
Title: Motor burnt out after 2 uses, terrible product.
Body: After making 2 banana smoothies the motor burnt out, a horrid burnt rubber smell took over the entire house, terrible blender.

Author: The Wandering Wheels
Title: Blends greens, with a few chunks
Body: Quite impressed with this blender for the price! I drink green smoothies regularly and it does blend kale/spinach/dates (which are hard to blend) ALMOST completely. I don’t mind a few chunks, so I’m happy with it!

Author: dena l.
Title: Great product!
Body: I bought this blender for my daughter because she wanted to make smoothies before school. First let me say the blender comes with a glass jar which is super high-quality. The blender has several settings, blends beautifully, and it's really easy to clean. For the price you can't beat it

Author: Allison D
Title: Amazing value
Body: Powerful and super easy to clean

Author: Brae
Title: Weak Blending Power, Have to Shake It Myself
Body: Haven’t had too much trouble cleaning this, but honey....the blending power is near nonexistent. I definitely got my money’s worth, but it wasn’t fully worth it. I have to physically shake the blender while it’s on to blend all the ice & fruit. Overall, it’s ok. Decent if you’re on a budget and can manage your frustration and patience when it comes to making a smoothie. 3/10, don’t really recommend.

Author: rita graham
Title: Good product
Body: Love it easy to use my 8yr old makes her own smoothies

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: A Blend of Happiness !!!
Body: Love it, Love itIt does actually what I brought it for and that was to amp up my breakfast shakes. AMAZON is my personal mall.. Take that C virus!! Can't stop us from Shopping !!!!!?

Author: MARY MAY
Title: Best for price
Body: Love itHave had 3 X expensive, buy this one. sturdy does what it says

Author: Country Folks
Title: Works very good
Body: Nice blender. Works pretty good.

Author: Boudreau
Title: USED!
Body: Was sent a used and returned product. Box arrived with tamper tape over broken tamper tape. Blender motor not powerful at all. The Blender cover is made cheaply and would not assume it to be dishwasher safe as it would warp. I guarantee this is a Hamilton Beach knock off product and will be contacting HB company to confirm this product is a serial asscoiated to them.

Author: Patricia Schore
Title: Glass cracked after 2 weeks. Avoid!!!!!!!!!
Body: The glass cracked after 2 weeks. I contacted customer service and they said the glass wasnt cover in the warranty. What?!?!?!. Avoid Hamilton Beach products at all costs.

Author: Monica
Title: Horrible blender
Body: Horrible never buy it! Loud, doesn't crush anything frozen or even fruits from the fridge.

Author: Phyllis Taylor
Title: Great product!
Body: I sent it to a young mom and she loves it! She likes to mix bananas and milk for her kids milkshakes and formula and bananas for the baby! Is so handy for a young mom!!!

Author: Kristin
Title: Great for the Price, Makes Smoothies No Problem
Body: So far so good. I have used it to make slushies and smoothies using frozen fruit and ice, and haven't had any issues. It isn't the most powerful blender but gets the job done. Only complaint is the lid is very tight.

Author: sparkymark
Title: Blender has issues, can work good though
Body: Love the pulse buttons, really easy to clean.update 1 year later, 3rd use. Made milkshake tonight started leaking tighten went to pour and it kept leaking or bottom. Make sure you keep pressure towards the tightening the jar or it will leak. Leaking will continue until you completely clean jar and reassemble.

Author: donatta ibe
Title: Blending power suuuuuucks!!
Body: The blending Power is horrible. I make a smoothie everyday and I use frozen strawberries. It takes me long periods of time and it will still either have while I blended strawberries left inside the smoothie or huge chunks of strawberries and then by the time I over blend the smoothie will be thin but the chunk of strawberries will still be there. I prefer a thick will blended smoothie and I can’t get that with this cheap machine. Don’t buy!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: A blender that can’t blend
Body: I mainly bought a blender for two things: smoothies and salsa. This blender can barely blend either. The day I first got it I tried making a tomatillonsalsa and it would just refuse to properly purée the salsa and instead just stirred everything inside for a while (no matter which option I picked). I gave up on the salsa. A few days later I tried making a banana milkshake and it took so long to blend one banana. I had to continuously stir it with a spoon in between pulses bc otherwise it just won’t blend and still it was chunky. Tonight was the last straw when I was making a salsa for my burrito and after a feeble attempt and blending my tomatoes, onions peppers and cilantro into a salsa it just died out on me and refuses to turn in.Overall, if you want a blender that actually blends, DO NOT GET THIS BLENDER

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not too noisy
Body: It blends smoothly! I love it.

Author: customer
Title: Trouble with top cover
Body: When I close the cover lid on my unit, it is so tight that it takes great effort to remove it. So much so that the contents come flying out. Because of that I do not seal the lid..

Author: Wenmin Ye
Title: not bad
Body: The bottom is not removable, sometimes things get stuck inside and cannot be cleaned

Author: Ratmun
Title: Blends me a shake worth shakin' to!
Body: Perfect for what I needed! Good, powerful blender that shreds up ice in my shakes faster than I can 'shake' a stick at! I love the top (though it takes getting used to removing it as it fits nice and snug for no leaks) that has two 'doors' to open up for adding ingredients and for pouring into your glass/cup afterward. Best blender I've owned in a LONG TIME! Worth the awesome price $!

Author: Suzanne
Title: Works well
Body: So far, it's working as a blender should. I've had no issues with it but I am being a bit gentle with the blade assembly when taking apart for washing, as other reviewers have had this part break. It's easy to clean and when putting it back together, I do not tighten the blade parts too tight.

Author: Saudamani Gray
Title: Blender
Body: The blender works very well so far

Author: Beth
Title: Defective
Body: One of the buttons doesnt even work and there are 4 buttons for blending -___-

Author: RL
Title: Power
Body: I think this item is on the cheaper end of quality. I guess you get what you pay for. I is useful for light blending, but when you are trying to blend heavier vegetables, etc. much harder to use. You have to push material towards blades, which can be hazardous to the item doing the pushing.

Author: Joseph Havranek
Title: Noisy
Body: This is a very good blender, but very, very noisy.Good thing we only use it once in while.

Author: Byambasuren Battulga
Title: Not blending strongly
Body: I thought Hamilton Beach has good quality but this time and this blender wasn’t good want I was thinking. Although, I’m using this product everyday no choice. Advantage is easy to clean and looks very quality. Not too bad. Next time will buy expensive one.

Author: allaidoska victor
Title: very good
Body: Very good

Author: Michael
Title: A great, simple blender.
Body: Incredible value. I was just looking to make some smoothies/frappes a few times a week and really wasn’t looking for anything fancy. After a bit of research I found the perfect blender. I already used it multiple times and it does exactly what I wanted. Totally recommend for any non pro cooks.

Author: kait
Title: Ehh. Its okay. Good for salsas and hummus
Body: Only had the blender for a few weeks and the glass broke today while blending :( I bought this because my old blender quit after 4 years. Was an okay blender. The blender had a hard time even chopping small chunks of ice.

Author: Gregg C Palacios
Title: Did care for it
Body: It was kinda cheap, and it didnt blend up strawberries and ice very well, not very satisfied with this product

Author: Russell Biart
Title: Fantastic blender, but difficult to open
Body: This blender is fantastic. I use it mostly for making smoothies from frozen fruit, and it does a great job of chopping rock-hard ice into a delicious smoothie quickly. It's also surprisingly quiet for how powerful it is. The only thing I don't like about it is that the lid is very difficult to remove - it takes all of my strength to pull the lid off.

Author: Sarah Nelson
Title: Love it!
Body: I wasn’t expecting a great product at the low price that I paid, but wow! This blender is amazing! It works so well and is really high quality!

Author: Ran mar
Title: Recommended
Body: Love it

Author: Debra Levierge
Title: Blender
Body: Great

Author: Linda
Title: Not what I expected from a blender
Body: I bought this blender thinking it had sharp blades like all the blenders I've had in the past. Come to find out they were not sharp at all and very blunt so that many types of food would not blend up properly. I suppose it's good for milkshakes and powdered smoothies with soft bananas, but this is not what I bought it for only. I also had a hard time getting pieces of food that became constantly caught in the crack surrounding the blade section. Over all disappointing.

Author: Barry Horst
Title: Works with Mason jars!!
Body: What i love the most about this blender is that it works with glass Mason jars! I had searched and searched for this blender! I love it!!

Author: Frequent Amazon Buyer
Title: Insufficient power
Body: Low power. Jams easily with berries!

Author: kirthi
Title: Not a new product
Body: I returned this product because it was already used by someone previously. I found it because mixer was not properly cleaned when I received.

Author: Julie C.
Title: Good Value
Body: This is a great, inexpensive blender. It works just as well as my Nutribullet and is much less expensive. I am happy with this purchase.

Author: J.Weddeye
Title: Underpowered
Body: Grossly underpowered.

Author: Hannah Gorman
Title: Not bad
Body: Doesn’t work as well as I wish, but it’s decent for the price

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: It's broken
Body: It does not work anymore. It simply did not work after 29 days. When I filled it up to make a smoothie it did not turn and started smoking. I would like a refund!

Author: Robert McGowan
Title: Questionable Power
Body: I defrost my frozen fruit quick before throwing them in the blender, and every time I've done it I've gotten chunks left unblended. I've adjusted what setting I've used, adjusted the the amount of time (5 minutes max) and regardless it's still chunky.

Author: SS
Title: Doesn't blend well
Body: This blender left chunks of frozen fruit and baby spinach unblended. I feel like none of the settings make a difference when you are trying to blend ingredients to make a smoothie. I'm not sure about other things to blend, but I don't have much faith left in this blender. I would not recommend, spend a little more money and get yourself a better blender.

Author: sabknits
Title: Hamilton Beach Power Elite Blender with 12 Functions
Body: Good, heavy base, glass jar, pull off lid. Blends nicely without excessive overheating.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Very poor blending power
Body: The absolute worst. The blending power is ridiculously low and I ended up packing it up and getting a different blender

Author: Thomas Brown
Title: Fails to deliver
Body: This blender is almost as bad as the development of the F-35 jetfighter. It is made to do too many things and underperforms. That dinky blade doesn't move stuff very well. 700 watts is more than enough power, but the blade does not help to utilize that power. It'll make smoothies, but if you overload it, you'll be helping it with a spoon to get stuff moving. Even after putting ice and adding water, there was like an air pocket something that would not enable the blender to do what its supposed to do. Bad design. My old Oster with a new blade would beat this one easily. It might mill coffee like it said, and it probably mill better than it blends.

Author: Daphne
Title: it alright
Body: i would but another blender but you’re paying for what you’re getting

Author: Miss Sherry
Title: The sheerness of this blender is awesome!
Body: My daughter loves everything about how it is very sturdy and easy to clean and the blending power is great for her smoothies. She has no complaints.

Author: Joyce goodlett
Title: Milkshakes
Body: Nice

Author: Cesar lopez
Title: Doesnt work
Body: Dont buy it

Author: Catherine
Title: fine
Body: Fine

Author: Alison Fox
Title: Awesome!
Body: I mainly use blenders for frozen drinks and smoothies and I can tell you it is awesome! Blends so smooth and has a easy clean way to pour the drink into a different glass. I a very happy with this purchase!

Author: Dan
Title: No sirve para hielo o fruta congelada
Body: He tratado de hacer Smoothie o jugos con fruta congelada y el resultado es horrible o tengo que licuar y licuar.

Author: Sallie Moore
Title: Do not recommend
Body: Used for smoothies but would not chip the frozen fruit. The blades got stuck on top of each other and then the rubber seal tore. Also, very difficult to remove the top after use. Do not recommend.

Author: Virgia Thornton
Title: Missing the seal
Body: The blender worked fine but when I took the glass container off all the liquids fell out the bottom the seal is my there

Author: Pavlo
Title: Very good considering the price
Body: Could be a perfect cheap blender, but:1. The first button (Mix, Milkshake, Easyclean) stopped working after I touched it for 0.5 seconds by mistake. Not a big deal for us as we don't use it anyway. But it pretty much illustrates the quality of the product.2. The lid is VERY hard to remove - my wife has to ask me to take it off when she wants to clean it.Anyway, it was ~25$, so we can live with it. We use it for cocktails, smoothies, etc., but it's capable of crunching ice cubes, so I tend to consider it powerful enough.

Author: KC
Title: Cant blend - joke of a blender
Body: I tried blending some diced tomatoes and onion and after several attempts it still didn’t liquify the mixture and I had to scoop out some of the unblended pieces of onion. I know this is a cheap blender but I’ve had other cheap ones and they could at least blend this, I imagine that if I try to make a smoothie with some frozen fruit this blender isn’t going to do very well.Don’t buy this blender, get another one.

Author: Steve D
Title: It's a blender alright
Body: Delivered on time. Delivered in one piece. Reasonably priced. Blends stuff. Done ( ;

Author: phyllis light
Title: Love it
Body: Great for smoothies

Author: Viper 45
Title: Less than 6 months and need to replace
Body: Gave this item as a gift and it has to be replaced already. Buttons are broken. Sad quality.

Author: JG8
Title: Works fantastic
Body: I have been using it for almost a year now. It has been working great and the blades are still sharp as before. The only thing to remember is that this is an entry level blender with a lower power motor. So there are some applications that require higher power where this blender does notwork that great.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: no power
Body: Doest crash ice and frozen fruits

Author: Cristofell
Title: Si uno sabe cuidar las cosas duran y no se dañan tan fácil..
Body: Me encanto

Author: rebeca nelson
Title: Very good blender
Body: I use to work in a high end culinary and electric store and sold lots of high end kitchen products. However, I don't work there anymore and my paycheck has shrunk. I needed a blender and I really wondered about this because it didn't have a huge price tag and the blade is smallish. It has been about over a year when I purchased this blender and it still works. I have made hummus, salsa, basic smoothie drinks and pureed soups. It works-it does the job! I have been surprised at how long these inexpensive items have lasted me-and how they work just as well as the higher end electronics. I always take care of my things, so, I use baking soda to wash the carafe, take the bottom off to really clean it, I don't use the dishwasher and I use a dampish paper towel to clean the outside of the blender. It is a great little blender.

Author: G$McAwesome
Title: Don’t be fooled! Stay away!
Body: This is by far the worst blender I have ever purchased in my life. On its first maiden use, I was making a smoothie; I put in half a cup of yogurt, a half a cup of frozen strawberries, and a half a cup of frozen blueberries with a splash of milk. I hit the pulse and blend and begin to combine my ingredients. It makes horrible noises, so I slow it down. Give it more time to work. I can see it’s not blending well at all. So, I go to take the blender off the base and the whole thing falls apart in my hand. The bottom blender attachment falls out from the bottom onto my floor, semi-blended blueberries and yogurt go all over my floor and appliances. I would not recommend this blender to my worst enemy.

Author: Cyno
Title: Blends so good it'll knock your socks off!!!
Body: Ya know, I wasn't sure what to expect from a $30 blender however, it certainly surpassed my expectations. Perfectly fine for daily use and gets the job done very well.

Author: Ethan Godfrey
Title: Amazing
Body: Works great. Awesome purchase for a great price

Author: Bella
Title: Very Disappointed
Body: This is the least powerful blender I've ever had the experience of using. My 20 year old blender (also from Hamilton Beach) did a much better job. It does not blend/chop and forget liquefy. I cannot expressly how supremely disappointed I am with the product - I tried to chop up spinach this morning and it literally did not move in the cup at all. Fair warning - choose a better model.

Author: Beverly M.
Title: Not worth a dime
Body: This a weak and cheap (should be priced less) blender. The top doesn’t stay on (suction is oddly shaped) so you cannot use the lid to pour at all. The blending is loud and strange...it doesn’t evenly blend anything and it takes much longer than my bullet did. My bullet was 15 years old and starting to slow down which is why I bought this one. Probably going to fish my bullet out of the donation pile and return to using it and donate this crap instead.

Author: Margarita Torres
Title: Super bueno!
Body: A este producto le he sacado lo invertido ya! Es super bueno y por el precio aun más todavía. Lo recomiendo al 100%

Author: Pattey
Title: don't recommend for smoothies
Body: it was hard to chop frozen fruits. Smoothies were tricky

Author: Ms FoggWebb
Title: Great For Smoothies
Body: Item was as described. Great addition to kitchen appliances. Does the job for the most part for smoothies, however, didn't grate the veggies completely like my old Black & Decker did.

Author: Audrey J
Title: It doesn’t do anything.
Body: This is the worst blender I’ve ever purchased. The “blades” in it aren’t even sharp!!! I can’t even purée parsley in this stupid thing. God, I’m so mad. It’s also louder than a freight train.

Author: Jena Crabb
Title: Horrible Blender!
Body: This blender is GARBAGE!! I have had my old blender for almost 10 years and the bottom, plastic piece broke so we needed a new one. I know I didn’t spend more than $30 on it, so I thought this one would be okay. I make smoothies most often. I put the same ingredients in the same order in this blender and it did NOTHING. I don’t even use ice. Just frozen fruit, yogurt, and milk (it’s for my 2 year old daughter). It doesn’t even move the ingredients around. It is AWFUL!! Do not buy this blender. I will be returning it ASAP.

Author: CBB
Title: Ok for smoothies
Body: Wish it didn't take so long to blend as the blades aren't that sharp nor sturdy but daughter loves it for smoothies so it will do.

Author: Mark
Title: Good enough
Body: Blender is not the best, but decent enough especially for the price. I mainly use it to make shakes with almond milk, spinach, bananas, blueberries and protein powder. It takes a while to blend, and you need to play with it a bit so that it blends everything. Noise is also average, not too loud.

Author: jhon valverde
Title: Llego rapido
Body: Un buen producto

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Can’t blend bananas!
Body: I don’t think this can blend a banana, tried for an hour to make apple sauce with no luck. RETURNED!!

Author: sooyoungpark
Title: Arrived very quickly
Body: What I ordered arrived earlier than expected.Blender performance is good for the price.The power is weak and the contents are roughly crushed.However, I am very satisfied for the same price.

Author: danielle
Title: Great Value for the Money
Body: Overall this blender has worked well for us. It gets used 5+ times a week for making smoothies with frozen fruit, fresh spinach, peanut butter, protein powder, and almond milk. I have to do the salsa quick blend option a few times before I can hit the smoothie option. Sometimes when I hit the smoothie option to start the frozen fruit will get stuck above the blade and the blade just goes and goes, not blending anything. Its a little annoying but we have learned to use it so that doesn't happen.I have tried to use it for food processing - making salsa, pesto, energy bars. But this product is definitely NOT designed for that kind of food processing.Cleanup is easy and I like that the blade comes off completely so you can really clean it. The glass is thick and quite sturdy, I have never worried about breaking it.So, if you're looking for a blender to make some delicious smoothies or milkshakes, this one will do. If you're looking for something that can also make salsa or sauces, find something else.

Author: Terri
Title: Wonderful Product
Body: Got my blender yesterday...made my first smoothie in it. Easy to use and easy to clean. No issue's with. I would recommend this product if you want a really good blender and price tag that fits too!!

Author: Max Shmookler
Title: Saddest “Blender” I’ve Ever Seen
Body: If you’re looking for a blender-shaped display case to show off how completely unblended all your smoothie ingredients are, then this “blender” is for you! None of the settings work. No matter which setting your choose, or what you put in, all it does is mush up the lowest 1/2 inch of stuff and leaves the rest untouched. Then you have to scoop out all your berries or ice cream scoops or whatever and...and what? Blend them by hand? Write a review on Amazon? The company DOESNT ALLOW RETURNS for its so-called blender, so enjoy popping those blueberries one by one.

Author: Long Island NY
Title: Glass bowl is HEAVY! Love the lid with pour spout.
Body: I really like this blender, it gets the job done. I thought there were more multiple speeds, but the 3 buttons and 2 pulse get the job done. Easy to clean, but I fear for the bowl to break since it's glass and HEAVY. I like the blade rotor is in its own casing, no fuss no muss. Push the rubber lid down all the way and the pour spout keeps it drip free.

Author: Georgia Taylor
Title: Blender needs to blend.
Body: didn't blend my Ingredients to make salsa

Author: Ang
Title: Cute but too much water required
Body: This blender is cute but lacks sum power. You must add too much water to make it blend enough for smoothies. Also, the top clear parts come off too much and don't close enough for my liking. The pouring opening is too far back. It does clean easily and isn't very loud. I returned it because I don't like to add so much water.

Author: bulletpark
Title: For the price, it's all you need.
Body: It does the job, and is pretty easy to clean in both the sink and the dishwasher. The blending power could be a little better for some things, as sometimes solid chunks have a hard time getting sucked into the blades, but a little shake usually works that out.

Author: Charles Wedgeworth
Title: Piece of junk
Body: Bought in May, used twice and stopped working.

Author: Barbara D. Mclin
Title: Powerful yet easy to clean
Body: It comes apart easily. Works quickly and efficiently

Author: Michael Czarny
Title: Underpowered. Get what you pay foor.
Body: Underpowered, poor mixing design container, lots of hold up on the sides, difficult to empty out with spatula.

Author: debbie daigle
Title: did not get a lid
Body: Got the blender did not get the lid was not in the boxotherwise love the blenderThank you

Author: carolyn clenny
Title: The lid didn't fit.
Body: The lid has to be held in place or it pops off.

Author: redhotredsox2004
Title: Broke after about 15 uses.
Body: Well I bought this item 2 yrs ago but I do not use it often. I used it about 15 times total. Like other reviewers mine broke in a similar spot. The collar of the blender that holds the blade to the pitcher to the base broke/snapped. Didn't even know. Went to pour milk into the pitcher and it spilled out the bottom. When it did work it did a so so job. I would use this to make pesto sauce and the nuts and small objects would get stuck under the blade in this ring hole if you will. It would always be a major pain to get these out and clean.

Author: carina
Title: Good, good, good
Body: Good, good, good

Author: NC Car Guy
Title: Spend the money for a nicer blender.
Body: Spend a few more dollars for a better blender. We make alot of smoothies and this blender doesn't even come close to doing the job. Whether it's a premade smoothie mix from daily harvest or a homemade mix this blender doesn't come close to being powerful enough. It does a far poorer job than the $20 walmart blender I currently have. AVOID THIS BLENDER! I went off the reviews and I have no clue how anyone rated this highly.

Author: Eda
Title: Great purchase
Body: Blending power is so powerful! Can crush frozen fruit very easily, amazing product for the price!

Author: SP68686868
Title: Lid has to be pryed off. But does job of blending
Body: Works goodMy day blenders weren't so expensive so went with thisOnly gripe really Is how hard it is to take lid offEvery time

Author: Madeleine
Title: Wanted to like it, but not good.
Body: I read a lot of reviews before buying this blender, but I did want one on the low price point side. I've tried mixing the ratios of liquid to frozen fruit, but without fail there are always some things left unblended with this blender (no matter what setting I use). While the power is ok, I think the blades are just pretty low. The lid also will not stay on several weeks in (I have to hold it on top). Wouldn't recommend.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Bad Choice!
Body: Very disappointed with Amazon and there handling my situation, I used this blender for smoothies , only used it for the 4th time today as a matter of fact, a bad smoky smell came out of the motor and the speed went to zero , I immediately unplugged the blender and set it outside because it is still smoking and now my kitchen stinks like burning electrical smell. Contacting the manufacturing company because Amazon didn't help, also Hamilton Beach is not answering the phones so I am emailing them about this. Will update the outcome later as I find out.

Author: Harry Pointer
Title: Convenient esay to use works well yet affordable
Body: Gets the job done

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Good while I had patience
Body: So I got this blender in February 2019 and within a couple months the screw on base that makes it sooo easy to take apart and clean, cracked and made it so that it leaked if I wasn't super careful. I ignored it for a while but it got to be a hassle. I contacted Hamilton Beach and after some back and forth I was able to get a replacement part within in warranty period, so no cost, but it did take a few weeks. Got the new part (around September/October) and it's been great until now. SAME ISSUE. The screw on base cracked again. I taped it back together and I'm shopping for a better blender.We use it EVERYDAY for our coffee so it's important that it work and not just break. It's just my husband and I using it in the morning. 2 adults, using it a total of about a minute a day total. Especially this time around we have been VERY gentle with it, knowing of the previous issue (lasted about a year this time vs. 3-4 moths the first time arounf)... We also usually just rinse it out, since we only use it for coffee, so wear and tear wise I don't think the base should be cracking after a couple months use. Probably a defect of some sort.Anyway, ot really has been a decent blender, just not going to go through the hassle of trying to get a replacement part for a $30 blender.

Author: Michi Good
Title: Amazing blender!
Body: Works great! Makes great smoothies and pina coladas! The pouring spout on top of the lid is a game changer for sure.

Author: Deborah Frimmel
Title: No power to blend ice
Body: This blender has a really hard time blending anything with ice. So smoothies are difficult if you like ice in them. I'm disappointed overall with the blending power of this product.

Author: S & J
Title: The lid...the lid...the lid...
Body: Taking the lid off is nearly impossible. I usually have to shake it so the room temperature fruit catches the blades. I wouldn't buy this again.

Author: Audrey
Title: Beautiful
Body: Love it will no be upset works wonderfully

Author: Suzanne
Title: great product

Author: Jan Allen
Title: works as expected
Body: as expected

Author: Della Smalling-Robinson
Title: Awesome
Body: Getting ready for baratric surgery will have to have blended food for awhile

Author: Alex The Car Guy
Title: It was a nice blender while it lasted (only a few months)
Body: This blender worked great for a few months then one day while making salsa which is not something hard to blend, the motor started smoking and it smelled like burned. What's strange is that the blender still turns on but it smokes like it has fully broken down. It was not worth to try and keep and using it so we just threw it away before it causes a fire or something.

Body: Worst blender in my life. If anything is larger than an inch it will get stuck because it has inch long dimples.Doesn't blend things properly. Made salsa and huge chunks of onion. Everything uneven.Blades are too high things get trapped.Need like 3 cups of water for anything to blend.Blade design airrates food really quickly and that is undesirable.If it wasn't a gift I would have returned it.

Title: I dont like qulity...and its leaking....

Title: Great buy
Body: Great

Author: Ian Smith
Title: plastic base split in 5 months
Body: had a HB blender that motor went after 20 yrs. replaced it with this one and the one-piece plastic base/gasket has split after 4 months. cheap plastic parts where the connection matters most - garbage.

Author: BK
Title: Not worth the hustle
Body: Broke within few months of using it. No point that it comes with a warranty; the claim process was extremely inefficient.

Author: jon g
Title: Will not blend Kale.
Body: Dislike almost everything about this. Except the price. Can pour ice into the top while blending. Top too tight. And, its critical flaw, it won't blend up the Kale in a smoothie. Leaves it too chunky. My last $20 blender from Walmart handled the Kale. This doesn't. I'm not one to complain, usually, but I saw other reviews that warned me of this. But, then I saw other reviews that says it makes great smoothies, so I went for it, thinking they naysayers were just crabby. lol. nope. It won't do Kale smoothie. So, if you want one of those, don't get this.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Needs more power!
Body: This blender is great for simple smoothies, but it gets stuck a lot and doesn't blend when there is too much in it. And by too much, I mean half full of stuff. I have only made smoothies or simple things like making sauces.

Author: Gen H.
Title: Terrible.
Body: Weak blender. Would've been fine with it but bottom fell off on its own immediately after I had filled it, oily mess splattered all over my kitchen. Very upset. Never had this happen with any blender before..

Author: Abraham Araya
Title: I want my money back
Body: It’s already broken. Doesn’t work

Author: David Bailey
Title: Slow but steady
Body: For the price it is good. It is a bit slow to puree(whole strawberries). Making smoothies or chopping veggies is pretty easy. I put it in the dishwasher after using and the blades were very clean.Overall, it's a good starter or low end blender.

Author: Billy Flowers
Title: Average Blender
Body: The blender was pretty good when filled with liquids, but sometimes struggled when trying to puree foods, the blades didn't like not being immersed. The blades are driven by rubber sprockets which can put off a rubber-y smell when used for long periods. The rubber feet of ours stained out counter-top, even through a cloth oven mitt we had under it (see photos). It's very easy to clean and blades separate from housing easily. Does feel like a budget unit, light plastic, ours stopped working within 2 months, a grinding sound followed by the blades not moving anymore, blades and glass jar were intact, failure was somewhere in motor housing. Would not recommend.

Author: B Reuter
Title: Bought as a gift
Body: Bought as a gift. Recipient is happy with it.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: IT DOES NOT WORK! Please replace!!
Body: It does NOT work!!!

Author: Em
Title: Affordable but has its share of problems
Body: My biggest complaint is the lid. It is a pain in the butt to get off. Super annoying. It also doesn’t blend that well with frozen fruit to make smoothies which is what I bought it for. But it was cheap so I can’t complain too much.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Worst Blender I ever owned!

Title: Nope

Author: karen

Author: SoCal Home Cook
Title: Useless
Body: This model does not work at all. Despite contacting customer service via email and telephone, they refused to replace or address my concerns and now I have a piece of junk that I regret must go to an e-waste dump. I tried to puree soft fruits and vegetables without luck and I tried to make a pesto sauce with fresh basil, grated parmesan and olive oil, but the blender did not blend; it just moved the materials around. I bought this blender to replace a Hamilton Beach model 57101 that had been working for 20+ years except for the lid that cracked.

Author: Emily S.
Title: Waste of Money - Blends Poorly
Body: I wish I hadn't bought this blender and will hopefully be able to return it. The blades are so dull I can run my fingers against them with no fear of being cut. The smoothie button should be renamed the chunky button because after 5 minutes of trying to blend my smoothie I still ended up with huge chunks of banana. It doesn't seem to mix anything except for the items closest to the blade so you have to continuously turn it off, push things down, and then start again.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great product
Body: It works great and the blades are very strong. No leakage and the size of the glass container is suitable. I am happy that after returning two other brands I finally could find this product that works well.

Author: Jon
Title: Extremely loud!
Body: Great blender with many options but I find it extremely loud!

Author: Talithacumi Nwachukwu

Author: Ashley Turner

Body: Amazing for the price

Author: FreshHoney
Title: The lid is horrible...
Body: For the price and size and brand I felt this was a good purchase. But the lid is plastic and extremely hard to remove from the blender. I'm afraid I'm going to spill everything everywhere when trying to pry this lid of as not everything comes out the spout. Horrible lid no wiggle room. And does not crush up ice in small chunks. I didn't use a lot of ice and had more liquid in the blender I was not doing n e thing incorrectly and the ice was still to big. I have a smaller blender outside of this one and a different brand and it really crushes the ice. I think I may return. Going to give it one more go around and if it does better than going to keep it and shop for a different lid. This lid is impossible .. it hard to get the lid on it and of course even harder to get the lid off

I rinse it in the sink and put in the dish washer and it's like new every time

Therefore, it is useless in making drinks with ice, crushing ice or making anything with frozen fruit. I have had many blenders before that have been cheaper than this, but this is by far the worst one I've ever had.

Body: I couldn't believe how easy this was to use I had a smoothly maker an nija which both were extremely hard to use couldn't open easy .This was fabulous from the minute I opened it so easy an smooth to use I can make shakes again for my grand babies doesn't matter if there teens now still my grand babies

Author: WrethaOffGrid✨🌟⭐😎
Title: It crushes ice
Body: I bought this to make my protein smoothies, I needed something large enough to make a full sized smoothie and occasionally make 2 for me and a friend. I needed it to be able to crush ice, easily clean, and I had to be able to run it off my solar system so it couldn't be too high in watts.It has done all these things for me, and it looks nice sitting on my counter top.Cons: the lid is a little tricky, it seems to be keyed to the pouring spout, if I push it all the way down until it snaps in place, it was very difficult to remove, I just don't snap it down anymore, I place it loosely on top and hold it with my hand, it's not an issue for me.

Author: S. Rose
Title: I Love it, Does the Job!
